content.question: The sculpture shown appears life-like and natural as a result of the

choices.label: sense of balance provided by the contrapposto stance
emotional expressiveness captured by the Archaic smile
realistic depiction of an individual including physical flaws
sense of calm achieved through its compactness of form

content.answer: sense of balance provided by the contrapposto stance

topic.text: 2.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
